				<h1 class="headingOrange">Dealey Plaza Paintball </h1>
				<h2 class="whiteHeadingBoldLarge"><strong>Dealey Plaza in Virtual Reality on Steam.</strong></h2>

<p><strong>This VR game/virtual tour is on Steam for HTC Vive or Oculus Rift <br><a href="http://store.steampowered.com/app/615070/Dealey_Plaza_Paintball/">Buy Now</a></strong></p><p>
Dealey Plaza Paintball is a virtual reality game on steam. You can buy this title and play paintball or you can buy this title and take a virtual tour of the place of the assassination of John F. Kennedy in Dallas, Texas.</p>
